name: New Constructs
overview: New Constructs, LLC is an equity research firm. It specializes in quality-of-earnings, forensic accounting and discounted cash flow valuation analyses for all U.S. public companies. The firm extracts financial data directly from SEC filings and the notes to financial statements. It offers consulting and advisory services. The firm provides research through database and models that cover income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow data as reported in 10Ks and 10Qs. It analyses the economic earnings of companies, including detailed analyses of unreported options expenses, off-balance sheet debt, and other adjustments to reported earnings. The firm provides key data including but not limited to everything regarding option grants, off-balance sheet financing, write-downs, reserves, and pensions as taken from the notes to the financial statements. The firm offers web-based earnings and DCF models. It publishes detailed individual company reports; sector and index reports; custom database reports and screens; customer diagnostic analysis of the holdings, and the coverage list of companies including ratings on them. New Constructs, LLC was founded in July 2002 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee.
